excerpt: You carried your strength quietly - blue eyes, loyal heart, always ready to stand beside me.

Miss Molly was a rescue. We got her in 2010. Bless her ‚ù§. She became family after just a few short weeks. We sure love and miss her. Thanks to Rodney we have a great headstone for her. Perfect for her.
